text:
SRK To Recreate 'Yeh Kaali Kaali Aankhen' For His Upcoming Film Zero & We're Super Excited
SRK To Recreate 'Yeh Kaali Kaali Aankhen' For His Upcoming Film Zero & We're Super Excited
2018 has been a year of Bollywood remixes. From Nora Fatehi's Dilbar to Simmba's Aankh Maarey, all songs have released and created fireworks. Millennials are loving the good old 90s numbers and we're not surprised.
Instagram/SRK
These songs were fiery, upbeat and musical. And now before the year ends, we may just get another remix to spice up our New Year.
If reports at TimesNow are to be believed, then King Khan might be considering recreating one of his most popular numbers from Baazigar, Yeh Kaali Kaali Aankhein.
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES 183 SHARES
And unlike other remixes, Shah Rukh Khan himself will feature in the new version. We're wondering if the makers of the film will rope in the original diva, Kajol or will they use the cast of the film, Anushka Sharma and Katrina Kaif.
Zero is SRK's most expensive film as it's made on a budget of Rs 200 crore. The film releases on 21st December, 2018. For those who haven't seen the original song, take a look.
And here's the spectacular trailer of Anand L Rai's Zero.
title: SRK To Recreate 'Yeh Kaali Kaali Aankhen' For His Upcoming Film Zero & We're Super Excited
